name: QuestionnaireCCARSAlcoholUseRating
title: Questionnaire CCARS Alcohol Use Rating
description: Extent to which a person's use of alcohol impairs daily functioning.

concept.display: No impairment of general functioning due to alcohol use
Occasional difficulties in functioning due to alcohol use
Frequent difficulties in functioning due to alcohol use
Significantly impaired functioning due to alcohol use. Alcohol use dominates life to the exclusion of other activities
Constantly debilitated due to alcohol use, with no regard for basic needs or safety of self and others
